Question
========

Maxime de Tekkel finds in a *random sample* of 400 people that if there were elections now, 20% would vote for the PVV. The *margin of error* of this result at a *confidence level* of 95% is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.03
* 0.04
* 0.05

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.03: Incorrect
* 0.04: Correct
* 0.05: Incorrect
